src: The item is wrapped in bubble wrap.
ref: 该物品用气泡包装纸包着。

src: I emptied my pocket.
mt: 我把口袋里的东西都倒出来了。

src: Termites invaded the house.
The passenger arrives at the border.
The office is closed.
The girl was exhausted.
There is no place for the woman to line up.
ref: 那女人排队的位置没有了。

src: The girl squeezed her nose.
The band played their hit song.
mt: 乐队演奏了他们的热门歌曲。
ref: 乐队演奏了他们的热门歌曲。

src: The girl wanted to thank her math teacher.
mt: 这个女孩想感谢她的数学老师。
ref: 这个女孩想感谢她的数学老师。

src: The young campers are scared.
mt: 这些年轻的露营者很害怕。
ref: 年轻的露营者们感到害怕。

src: The man bumped his head.
My check was declined.
The man's email inbox was flooded with spam.
mt: 这位男士的邮箱被垃圾邮件淹没。
ref: 该男子的电子邮件收件箱中充斥着垃圾邮件。

src: The sailor was quarantined.
The girl remembered the password.
I poured water into the glass.
ref: 我把水倒进了玻璃杯中。

src: When his friend finished speaking, the man remained silent.
mt: 当他的朋友说完后，男人保持沉默。
ref: 他的朋友结束讲话的时候，那个人保持着沉默。

src: The accident was my fault.
The chain broke.
The couple decided to compromise.
The woman decided to run for public office.
mt: 这位妇女决定竞选公职。
ref: 该名妇女决定竞选公职。

src: The man expected the weather to be very cold during his journey.
ref: 该名男子预计他的旅途中的天气会很冷。

src: The student knows the answer to this question.
mt: 学生知道这个问题的答案。
ref: 学生知道这道问题的答案。

src: The man's eyes were crying.
ref: 这个男人的眼睛流泪了。

src: This player has won five consecutive games.
mt: 这位球员连续赢得了五场比赛。
ref: 这位玩家连续赢得了五场比赛。

src: The teacher tore up the student's test paper.
mt: 老师撕碎了学生的试卷。
ref: 老师撕毁了这位学生的试卷。

src: I stopped talking.
The frozen food is thawed.
The employee pretends to be sick.
The girl fell into the swimming pool.
The movie tickets are sold out.
The man lost weight.
The girl's hand blistered.
mt: 女孩的手皮肤起了水泡。

src: Circus performers juggling while riding a unicycle.
mt: 马戏演员在骑单车的同时进行杂技表演。
ref: 马戏团表演者在骑独轮车时玩杂耍。

src: I lost my patience.
The warring nations demand peace.
The man took sleeping pills.
The woman bumped into the sofa.
The boy squeezed a balloon.
The travelers checked into their hotel room.
mt: 旅客们入住了酒店房间。
ref: 旅客入住了他们的旅馆房间。

src: I bit a peach.
My hands are sticky.
I pushed the door.
Radicals boycotted these products.
mt: 激进分子抵制了这些产品。
ref: 激进分子抵制了这些产品。

src: I drilled a hole in the wall.
The woman envied her sister.
mt: 这个女人嫉妒她的姐姐。
ref: 这个女人羡慕她的妹妹。

src: I spilled wine on my shirt.
mt: 我把红酒洒在了我的衬衫上。

src: The cashier opened the cash register.
Street musicians attracted a group of people.
mt: 街头音乐家吸引了一群人。
ref: 街头音乐家吸引了一群人。

src: The little boy cried to his nanny.
mt: 小男孩儿哭着对保姆说。
ref: 小男孩向他的保姆哭了。

src: The pilot's radar spotted a storm.
mt: 飞行员的雷达发现了一场风暴。
ref: 飞行员的雷达发现了一场风暴。

src: The tree has fallen leaves.
mt: 这棵树的叶子已经落下了。

src: The boy wanted to play a prank.
The child complained that he must go to the bathroom.
mt: 孩子抱怨他必须去厕所。
ref: 这个孩子抱怨说他必须去洗手间。

src: The child sprinkled fish food into the water tank.
Women's political views have changed.
mt: 女性的政治观点发生了变化。
ref: 女人的政治观点发生了变化。

src: The sink in the bathroom is clogged.
The passengers got off the train.
The man pressed the wet mouth of the envelope.
mt: 这个人把湿润的信封口压在了嘴上。
ref: 该名男子按下信封的湿口。

src: Friends lost contact.
The accountant mismanaged the company's funds.
mt: 会计人员滥用了公司的资金。
ref: 会计师对公司的资金管理不善。

src: I look at the clock.
My hands tightened.
The bolts are tightened.
The couple signed an apartment lease.
mt: 夫妻俩签了一个公寓租约。
ref: 这对夫妇签了一份公寓租约。

src: The woman was sitting outside the porch.
mt: 这位妇女正在门廊外坐着。
ref: 那个女人坐在门廊外面。

src: The man was wearing a life jacket in the water.
mt: 这名男子在水中穿着救生衣。
ref: 该男子在水中穿着救生衣。

src: The woman made a typo in the word processor.
mt: 这位女士在文字处理器中打错了一个字。
ref: 那个女人在文字处理器中打了一个错字。

src: The girl brags to her friend.
mt: 这个女孩向她的朋友吹嘘。
ref: 这个女孩向她的朋友吹牛。

src: The lawn is muddy.
The woman overslept.
The man put on sunscreen.
mt: 这位男子涂抹了防晒霜。

src: The researchers proved this theory.
mt: 研究人员证明了这一理论。
ref: 研究人员证明了这一理论。

src: The fans booed in the game.
mt: 球迷们在比赛中哄声不断。
ref: 比赛中的球迷嘘声高涨。

src: I entered my combination code on the lock.
mt: 我在锁上输入了我的组合密码。
ref: 我在锁上输入了我的组合密码。

src: The crowd is increasing.
Snow blocked the driveway.
The kayaker was paddling.
mt: 这位划艇运动员正在划艇。

src: The girl's bicycle got out of control.
ref: 那女孩的自行车失控了。

src: I turned on the fan.
The surfer returned to the beach.
I pulled off the drain plug in the bathtub.
mt: 我把浴缸的排水口拔掉了。
ref: 我拉开了浴缸里的排水塞。

src: The husband feels guilty for cheating on his wife.
mt: 丈夫觉得自己背叛了妻子，感到内疚。
ref: 丈夫因欺骗妻子而感到内疚。

src: The ink on the poster was wiped away.
mt: 海报上的墨水被擦掉了。

src: The child yelled.
The boy put his feet on the table.
ref: 这个男孩把脚放在桌子上。

src: My friend turned his head in my direction.
mt: 我的朋友转过头来看我。
ref: 我的朋友朝我的方向转过头。

src: The government oppresses its citizens.
The boy got lost in the woods.
ref: 这个男孩在树林里迷路了。

src: This woman has traveled abroad.
The man is jealous of his colleague.
ref: 这个男人嫉妒他的同事。

src: The man witnessed aliens.
mt: 这位男子目睹了外星人。

src: The man's hair turned golden.
mt: 这位男子的头发变成了金黄色。
ref: 那男人的头发变成了金色。

src: The artist created a new work.
mt: 艺术家创作了一幅新作。

src: The son left the house.
The book fell off the shelf.
There is a power outage in my house.
We took a roller coaster.
The popcorn bag began to crack.
ref: 爆米花的袋子开始发出爆裂声。

src: A tree fell on the wire.
The speaker made politically incorrect comments.
mt: 演讲者发表了政治不正确的言论。
ref: 演讲者发表了政治上不正确的评论。

src: I stabbed myself with a needle.
The fish floated on the surface of the water tank.
The man's voice sounded hoarse.
mt: 这人的声音听起来沙哑。
ref: 那人的声音听起来嘶哑了。

src: The elevator door opened.
The teenager slipped out of the house.
The bathroom was flooded.
The puppy stayed near the owner.
mt: 小狗一直待在主人身边。

src: The man saw his reflection.
mt: 这个人看到自己的倒影。

src: I missed my girlfriend's call.
mt: 我错过了女朋友的电话。
ref: 我错过了我女朋友的电话。

src: The family searched the neighborhood.
When I exhaled, I saw my breath.
mt: 当我呼出气息时，我看到我的呼吸。
ref: 当我呼出时，我看到了我的呼吸。

src: The employees formed a union.
ref: 雇员们组成了一个工会。

src: I baked an apple pie.
The woman struggled to walk.
Steam rises from the pot.
All my socks are in the laundry room.
mt: 我所有的袜子都在洗衣房。
ref: 我所有的袜子都在洗衣房里。

src: The politician's argument was considered absurd.
mt: 这位政客的论点被认为是荒谬的。
ref: 那位政治家的论点被认为是荒谬的。

src: Everyone disagrees with the engagement of the couple.
mt: 大家都反对这对情侣的婚姻。
ref: 每个人都不赞成这对夫妇的订婚。

src: This building is dedicated to the millionaire.
mt: 这座建筑是献给百万富翁的。
ref: 这栋楼是献给这位百万富翁的。

src: The salesperson accused the girl of stealing.
mt: 售货员指控这位女孩偷东西。
ref: 售货员指控那个女孩偷窃。

src: The country declared war on its neighbors.
The court upheld the controversial ruling.
mt: 法院维持了有争议的裁决。
ref: 法院维持了这项有争议的裁决。

src: The girl smelled something burnt.
ref: 女孩闻到有东西烧焦了。

src: The rain is pouring down.
The building was evacuated.
The father hates his son's alcoholism.
The lawyer climbed the stairs to her office.
mt: 律师走上楼梯到达办公室。
ref: 律师爬楼去她的办公室。

src: The man was very annoyed with his friend.
mt: 这位男子对他的朋友很不满意。
ref: 那人对他的朋友很恼火。

src: The girl handed the money to the cashier.
ref: 那个女孩把钱交给了收银员。

src: The woman was put in a wheelchair.
The citizens hung the national flag outside their homes.
mt: 市民们把国旗挂在家门外。
ref: 市民们把国旗挂在家门外。

src: The team lost the game.
My friend pointed out that I had food stuffed in my teeth.
mt: 我的朋友指出我牙齿里有食物卡住。
ref: 我的朋友指出我的牙齿里塞了食物。

src: The boy failed the history exam.
mt: 这名男孩考了历史试卷。
ref: 这个男孩没有通过历史考试。

src: The building in the city center collapsed.
mt: 市中心的一栋建筑物倒塌。

src: The man's girlfriend broke up with him.
ref: 那男人的女朋友和他分手了。

src: The two children reached out to retrieve the ball at the same time.
mt: 这两个孩子同时伸手去捡球。
ref: 两个孩子同时伸手去取回球。

src: The bear ransacked the trash can.
The boy polished the pencil.
The cashier refused to refund the woman.
ref: 收银员拒绝给那女人退款。

src: The scratches on my skin are deep.
mt: 我的皮肤上的划痕很深。

src: The passengers on the train looked at him strangely.
mt: 火车上的乘客看着他奇怪地看着他。
ref: 火车上的乘客奇怪地看着他。

src: The child left the crumbs on the floor.
mt: 孩子把面包屑留在了地板上。
ref: 孩子把面包屑留在了地板上。

src: The woman handed her sister a tissue.
mt: 这位妇女递给她妹妹一张纸巾。
ref: 那个女人递给她的妹妹一张纸巾。

src: The man took mint.
The couple left early to watch the show.
mt: 夫妻俩早早就出门去看演出。
ref: 这对夫妇早早地离开去看演出。

src: The woman stayed at home and did not go to work.
mt: 这位妇女在家休息，不上班。
ref: 那女人呆在家里没去上班。

src: The man signed a petition from a human rights defender.
mt: 这位男子签署了人权捍卫者的请愿书。
ref: 那人在维权人士的请愿书上签了名。

src: The actor was flustered before the performance.
mt: 演员在表演前紧张不已。

src: I'm lost.
The ripe fruit shook in the sun.
mt: 成熟的水果在阳光下晃动。
ref: 成熟的果实在阳光下摇动。

src: The car broke down.
The man hurt his back.
I made a fire in the fireplace.
The woman stopped jogging.
I knocked on the neighbor's door.
The woman sighed in frustration.
mt: 这位妇女在失望中叹了口气。
ref: 那女人沮丧地叹了口气。

src: The teacher praised the students.
The woman ran out of eggs.
I met an old friend.
The woman avoided going to the lake.
mt: 这位女士避免了去湖边。

src: The students got soaked when they came to class.
mt: 学生们上课时被淋湿了。
ref: 学生来上课时浑身湿透了。

src: The cursor on the computer screen has moved.
mt: 计算机屏幕上的光标已经移动。
ref: 电脑屏幕上的光标移动了。

src: The driver took a detour.
I hung the wet sheets on the outdoor clothesline.
mt: 我把湿衣服挂在户外晾衣绳上。
ref: 我把湿床单挂在户外晾衣绳上。

src: The woman put on her sunglasses.
mt: 这位女士戴上了太阳镜。
ref: 那女人戴上了她的墨镜。

src: The man stared at the night sky.
I feel exhausted.
The man went to the barber.
The boy maliciously teased his new classmate.
mt: 这个男孩恶意欺负他的新同学。
ref: 这个男孩恶意地捉弄了他的新同学。

src: I want to drink a glass of milk.
It started to rain.
The parking lot of the building is empty.
mt: 建筑物的停车场空无一人。

src: The author missed the deadline for submitting the draft.
mt: 作者错过了提交草稿的截止日期。
ref: 作者错过了提交草稿的最后期限。

src: The colleague hung up my phone.
The wind blew through the open window.
The electricity in my house went out.
The weightlifter hummed.
mt: 举重运动员在举重时哼起了歌。

src: The student tried to mentally calculate.
The baby fell asleep.
The girl threw the water balloon at the boy.
ref: 女孩把水气球扔向男孩。

src: The photographer forgot to use the flash on the camera.
mt: 摄影师忘记使用相机的闪光灯。
ref: 摄影师忘了用相机上的闪光灯。

src: I declined the invitation to the birthday party.
mt: 我拒绝了邀请去参加生日派对。
ref: 我谢绝了生日聚会的邀请。

src: I exercised.
I squeezed this wet sponge.
mt: 我把这块湿润的毛巾捏了起来。

src: The tourists took the ferry to the resort.
mt: 游客乘坐渡船前往度假胜地。
ref: 游客们乘坐渡轮去度假村。

src: This teenager has tattoos.
An unfamiliar car parked outside my house.
mt: 一辆陌生的车停在我家门口。
ref: 一辆陌生的车停在我家外面。

src: The criminal surrendered.
The burly man decided to lose weight.
mt: 这个壮实的男子决定减肥。
ref: 那个魁梧的人决定减肥。

src: The girl stepped on the ice.
The woman has bags under her eyes.
mt: 这个女人下巴下方有眼袋。
ref: 那女人眼睛下面有眼袋。

src: Lava flows from the volcano.
The woman put on shoes.
I paid the fee to the toll booth attendant.
mt: 我付了通行费给收费员。
ref: 我向收费站服务员付了费。

src: The executive officer went bankrupt.
The man went to see a doctor.
I left the bedroom through the window.
The boy's fingers became wrinkled.
I spit out milk.
I missed the bus.
The truck collided with the car.
mt: 一辆卡车与一辆汽车相撞。

src: This team manipulated the game in a way to their advantage.
mt: 这支队伍操纵了比赛以便利他们。
ref: 这支队伍以对他们有利的方式操纵了比赛。

src: The soda bottle hissed.
The boy was locked outside the house.
Doorbell rang.
The man soiled his suit.
mt: 这位先生弄脏了他的西装。

src: The girl squeezed a tube of toothpaste.
mt: 这个女孩儿挤了一根牙膏。

src: The number of civilian deaths caused by the war has skyrocketed.
mt: 战争造成的平民死亡人数激增。
ref: 战争造成的平民死亡人数激增。

src: The girl pulled the ribbon out of her hair.
mt: 女孩把发带从头上扯下来。
ref: 那个女孩把丝带从头发上拉了出来。

src: The man had plastic surgery.
A little chicken came out of the egg.
mt: 一只小鸡从蛋里出来了。
ref: 一只小鸡从鸡蛋里出来。

src: The prisoner starved to death.
The man lost his balance on the ladder.
mt: 这人在梯子上失去了平衡。
ref: 那人在梯子上失去了平衡。

src: The child hiccups.
A cold wind came in from the window.
The student won a scholarship to go to university.
mt: 学生获得奖学金，前往大学学习。
ref: 这个学生获得了上大学的奖学金。

src: The girl teased the boy.
ref: 那个女孩打趣那个男孩。

src: The hungry tramp stole the food.
mt: 这个饥饿的流浪汉偷了食物。
ref: 饥饿的流浪汉偷走了食物。

src: I called my friend to chat.
ref: 我打电话给我的朋友聊天。

src: The man reached out his hand to me.
mt: 这个人伸出手来跟我打招呼。

src: I avoided.
The girl bit her nails.
I turned a page of the calendar.
The husband found out that his wife had an affair.
ref: 丈夫发现他的妻子有外遇。

src: The girl dropped the rubber ball.
The girl made a mistake in the exam.
mt: 这女孩在考试中犯了一个错误。
ref: 这个女孩考试犯了一个错误。

src: The player turned his opponent down.
mt: 球员拒绝了对手的邀请。

src: I picked tomatoes from the vine.
ref: 我从藤蔓上摘了西红柿。

src: The man wanted to be romantic.
The mercury in the thermometer rises.
The tornado passed through the entire town.
mt: 龙卷风穿过了整个城镇。
ref: 龙卷风穿过了整个城镇。

src: The student received counseling.
I feel very comfortable.
I polished the stone.
I added sugar to the coffee.
The man flipped through the newspaper.
I hit the nail with a hammer.
The fish bit the thread.
This teenager is embarrassed to go to school.
mt: 这个少年感到羞耻，不能上学。

src: My facial expression lit up.
ref: 我的面部表情亮了起来。

src: I wiped my hands with a towel.
The man lost his balance on the stool.
mt: 这人在椅子上失去了平衡。
ref: 那人失去了在凳子上的平衡。

src: The teammates blamed each other.
I ask for forgiveness.
This woman is tired of her date.
mt: 这位女士对她的约会感到很疲惫。
ref: 这个女人对她的约会感到厌烦了。

src: The girl flashed a smile.
The enemy ship exploded.
The man pierced his foot.
The detectives dusted the crime scene to show fingerprints.
ref: 侦探们在犯罪现场撒了粉来显示指纹。

src: The traffic on the highway is heavy.
mt: 高速公路上车流量很大。
ref: 高速公路上交通很拥挤。

src: The country's economy has declined.
The traffic controller whistled to the children.
mt: 交通指挥员吹哨叫孩子。
ref: 交通指挥向孩子们吹口哨。

src: I rolled my eyes at my friend.
mt: 我对朋友的言语嗤之以鼻。
ref: 我对我的朋友翻了白眼。

src: The car has run out of gasoline.
The woman started giving birth.
The man's hat was blown off.
mt: 这位男子的帽子被吹飞了。

src: The girl attended the birthday party of her classmate.
mt: 这位女孩参加了她的同学的生日派对。
ref: 这个女孩参加了她同学的生日聚会。

src: The boy's forehead is hot.
The man sprayed cologne.
The electricity in the house went out.
The family moved into a larger house.
mt: 这家人搬到更大的房子里。
ref: 一家人搬进了一所更大的房子。

src: The marathon runner kept a slow pace.
mt: 长跑运动员保持了一个缓慢的步伐。
ref: 马拉松运动员保持缓慢的步伐。

src: The boy kicked the vending machine.
mt: 男孩踢了一个自动售货机。

src: My friend's dog died.
The merchant's credit card was rejected.
ref: 商人的信用卡被拒绝了。

src: The man cursed.
The man is proud of his brother.
mt: 他很自豪地谈论着他的兄弟。
ref: 那人为他的兄弟感到骄傲。

src: This girl wants to understand the solar system.
mt: 这个女孩想了解太阳系。
ref: 这个女孩想了解太阳系。

src: The poster is stuck on the wall.
The client approved the architect's building plan.
mt: 客户批准了建筑师的建筑方案。
ref: 客户批准了建筑师的大楼计划。

src: The man dropped the spoon.
The CEO of the company resigned.
ref: 公司的首席执行官辞职了。

src: I was late for class.
The man was released from prison.
ref: 那人从监狱里被释放了。

src: The family lost all of its property.
mt: 这家人失去了所有的财产。
ref: 这个家庭失去了所有的财产。

src: I stepped on the aluminum can.
The girl joined the debate team.
ref: 这个女孩加入了辩论队。

src: My mood improved.
The charity set a fundraising goal.
mt: 慈善机构设定了筹款目标。
ref: 慈善机构制定了一个筹款目标。

src: The roller coaster descended quickly from the steep slope.
mt: 这座摩天轮从陡坡上快速下降。
ref: 过山车从陡坡上速降下来。

src: I am very angry.
The man wants to watch the sunrise.
I folded the paper.
This country has endured a natural disaster.
mt: 这个国家经历了自然灾害。
ref: 这个国家经受了一场自然灾害。

src: The boy's clothes were soaked.
The student hurriedly finished the book.
mt: 学生匆忙完成了这本书。

src: The criminal was executed.
The sun shines into the room.
I pulled the liar's hair.
mt: 我拉了那个骗子的头发。
ref: 我拉扯了那个骗子的头发。

src: The editor rewrote a sentence in the manuscript.
mt: 编辑重写了手稿中的一个句子。
ref: 编辑在手稿中改写了一句话。

src: The woman cancelled her credit card account.
mt: 这位女士取消了她的信用卡账户。
ref: 那女人取消了她的信用卡帐户。

src: Man and woman fall in love.
The music is too weak to hear.
The boy's hair stood up.
The bug was squashed.
I opened my eyes.
My neighbor's music is loud.
The man's family lives in poverty.
mt: 这位男子的家人生活在贫困之中。
ref: 那人的家庭生活在贫困之中。

src: This student graduated from university.
ref: 这个学生从大学毕业了。

src: The artist mixed yellow paint into blue paint.
mt: 艺术家将黄色颜料混入蓝色颜料中。
ref: 艺术家把黄色的油漆混合进蓝色的油漆。

src: I changed the topic of conversation.
My brother was discharged from the hospital.
The curtain on the stage opened.
The hostages obeyed the kidnappers.
A rumbling sound echoed on the stage.
mt: 舞台上响起了隆隆的声响。
ref: 一阵隆隆声在舞台上回荡。

src: The parents rushed to the child's bedroom.
mt: 父母急忙冲向孩子的卧室。
ref: 父母们冲到孩子的卧室。

src: The woman communicated with sign language.
mt: 这位妇女用手语与他人交流。

src: There was a drought in the area.
The cat chased the bird.
The girl changed schools.
The factory owner refused to raise the wages of his employees.
mt: 工厂老板拒绝提高工人的工资。
ref: 工厂老板拒绝提高雇员的工资。

src: This leader is fighting against extremists in his country.
mt: 这位领导人正在与国内极端分子作斗争。
ref: 这位领导人在对抗了他国家里的极端分子。

src: I walked barefoot on the beach.
I woke up in the middle of the night feeling very cold.
The mother quieted her son.
There is a hole in my jeans.
The boy wears braces.
I worked out at the gym yesterday.
Girls whisper to each other at the dinner table.
mt: 女孩们在餐桌上小声交谈。
ref: 女孩在餐桌上互相耳语。

src: The child fell on the trampoline.
mt: 孩子在蹦床上摔了下来。

src: I mailed the letter to the mailbox.
The gambler is very confident.
The forest fire spread.
The child tore his knee.
The man survived this deadly disease.
mt: 这位男子幸运地逃过了这场致命的疾病。
ref: 那人幸免于这种致命的疾病。

src: I took a sip of hot coffee.
ref: 我喝了一口滚烫的咖啡。

src: The editor fired the author.
I feel exhausted.
The doctor diagnoses the patient.
I scratched my skin.
The man underwent emergency surgery.
mt: 这名男子接受了紧急手术。

src: The man's arm muscles bulged.
ref: 那人的手臂肌肉鼓了起来。

src: The man raised his eyebrows.
I forgave my colleagues' stupid mistakes.
mt: 我原谅了同事们的愚蠢错误。
ref: 我宽恕了同事的愚蠢错误。

src: The man quit smoking.
The woman hit the attacker's nose with a fist.
mt: 这位妇女用拳头击中了袭击者鼻子。
ref: 那女人用拳头打袭击者的鼻子。

src: The dart missed the bull's eye.
The owner asked a murderer to come to his house.
ref: 房主要求一个灭害员到他家来。

src: I suggest my guests go out for dinner.
mt: 我建议我的客人出去吃晚饭。
ref: 我建议我的客人出去吃饭。

src: The girl found out that her brother was reading her diary.
mt: 这个女孩发现她的弟弟在读她的日记。
ref: 女孩发现她的哥哥在读她的日记。

src: The woman is short of money to pay the rent.
mt: 这位妇女缺钱支付房租。

src: The child's hand quickly flinched.
The company wants to measure customer satisfaction.
mt: 该公司希望测量客户满意度。
ref: 公司希望衡量客户满意度。

src: The wooden floor was scratched.
I covered my face.
This famous statue was burnt down.
mt: 这座著名的雕像被烧毁了。
ref: 这座著名的雕像被烧毁了。

src: I forgot the fruit on the table.
mt: 我忘记桌子上的水果了。
ref: 我把水果忘在桌子上了。

src: The ballet dancer tore the lace.
mt: 芭蕾舞演员撕掉了蕾丝。
ref: 芭蕾舞选手撕裂了系带。

src: The child's shoelaces were untied.
I am obsessed with this book.
This person has beliefs similar to those of his parents.
mt: 这个人和他父母的信仰观念类似。
ref: 这个人有着和父母相似的信仰。

src: The car gradually slowed to a stop.
ref: 汽车逐渐减速停了下来。

src: The man ate ice cream in the sun.
mt: 这人在阳光下吃冰淇淋。
ref: 那人在阳光下吃了冰淇淋。

src: I hang the artwork in the room.
mt: 我把这幅艺术品挂在房间里。
ref: 我把艺术品挂在房间里。

src: I got off work very early.
The puppy soiled the carpet.
I apologized to my friend.
The man stood out from the crowd.
ref: 那人在人群中脱颖而出。

src: The witness lied after taking the oath.
The woman dyed her hair.
These immigrants live in this country illegally.
mt: 这些非法移民住在这个国家。
ref: 这些移民是非法居住在这个国家的。

src: The public spokesperson made a joke.
ref: 公共发言人开了个玩笑。

src: I look at the sun.
I feel very boring.
Steak is difficult to cut.
The woman declared bankruptcy.
The light in my friend's apartment is on.
mt: 我的朋友的公寓里有灯。
ref: 我朋友公寓里的灯亮着。

src: I put flowers under my nose.
Woman feels nostalgic.
The student delays the article.
My car broke down.
I discarded the note.
The bird flapped its wings.
I parked the car in the driveway.
The criminal aimed a gun at his victim.
ref: 罪犯用枪瞄准他的受害者。

src: I look forward to the weekend.
I forgot the time.
The document is unrecognizable after printing.
ref: 文件打印出来后不可辨认。

src: The stadium played the national anthem.
The dip tasted bland.
I put the paper towel on the overflow.
The woman was interrupted while reading.
mt: 这位女士正在阅读时被打断。
ref: 那个女人在看书时被打断了。

src: The plane encountered some turbulence.
The boy flinched.
The doctor gave the patient a prosthesis.
ref: 医生给了病人一个假肢。

src: The boy squeezed the girl's elbow.
mt: 男孩用力抓住女孩的手臂。

src: I ask my friends for advice.
The boy stepped in the mud.
A few inches of snow fell in this town.
mt: 这座城镇有几英寸的雪。
ref: 这个镇下了几英寸的雪。

src: The employee's shift ends.
The tree damaged the house.
The wood was split in half.
The family congratulated the couple.
ref: 家人向这对夫妇表示祝贺。

src: The girl gave the boy a Valentine's Day gift.
mt: 女孩送男孩一份情人节礼物。
ref: 那个女孩给男孩送了个情人节礼物。

src: I nodded to my friend's statement.
ref: 我对我的朋友的陈述点头。

src: Friends toss a coin.
The kitchen timer went out.
This woman has set an ambitious goal.
mt: 这位女士设定了一个雄心勃勃的目标。
ref: 这个女人设定了一个雄心勃勃的目标。

src: The rich man died of old age.
ref: 那个有钱人因年老而死。

src: The woman stepped on the flame.
The woman's car is in the shop.
mt: 这位女士的车在修理厂。
ref: 那个女人的车在商店里。

src: I slept with the alarm clock.
Public figures came out of the limousine.
mt: 公众人物从豪华轿车中走了出来。
ref: 公众人物从豪华轿车里出来。

src: The woman stayed in the bathtub.
mt: 这位妇女一直待在浴缸里。

src: This college student wants to meet other students on campus.
mt: 这位大学生想在校园里认识其他学生。
ref: 这个大学生想在校园里认识其他学生。

src: I lifted the sofa cushion.
The wasp flew to the boy.
The woman was convicted of a misdemeanor.
ref: 这名妇女被判犯有轻罪。

src: I stir the sugar into the hot tea.
The veteran walked with a limp.
The criminal escaped from the police.
ref: 罪犯从警察身边逃走了。

src: The laptop cannot be turned on.
There is no room in the woman's wardrobe.
mt: 这个女人衣柜里没有空间。
ref: 那女人的衣橱没有空间了。

src: The man was very sad.
The man got his degree.
The man's voice was clearly visible in the auditorium.
mt: 这位男士的声音在演讲厅里清晰可闻。
ref: 那人的声音在礼堂里清晰可见。

src: I threw a coin into the fountain.
mt: 我把一枚硬币扔进喷泉。
ref: 我把一枚硬币扔进喷泉里。

src: The player hit the ball to the hole.
I breathe in the dust in the attic.
mt: 我在阁楼里吸入了尘土。
ref: 我在阁楼的灰尘中呼吸。

src: The store cashier called the security guard.
I take out the garbage.
The family went to the zoo.
The man's breathing was loud.
I have a ticket for the concert.
The air conditioner in the house is broken.
The boy's back pain.
I bought a gift for my mother.
mt: 我给妈妈买了一个礼物。
ref: 我给妈妈买了一件礼物。

src: The daffodils in the garden were destroyed.
ref: 花园里的水仙花被毁坏了。

src: I lighted a match.
The disputed parties reached a settlement.
The children were sent to an orphanage.
A meteorite fell into the sea.
The hiker encountered a poisonous snake.
ref: 徒步旅行者遇到了一条毒蛇。

src: The oven is getting hot.
I squeezed the lemon wedges.
New land has been discovered in this country.
mt: 在这个国家发现了新土地。
ref: 这个国家发现了新的土地。

src: The glass fell off the table.
ref: 玻璃杯从桌子上掉下来。

src: The table is shaking.
The father found out that his son was lying.
ref: 父亲发现他的儿子在撒谎。

src: The man's head quivered with pain.
ref: 那人的头因疼痛而颤动。

src: The train slowed down.
The man received treatment.
The woman grabbed her throat.
mt: 这位妇女抓住了自己的脖子。

src: The woman has a sore throat.
The dog looks at the juicy steak on the table.
mt: 这条狗看着桌上那块鲜嫩的牛排。
ref: 狗看着桌上多汁的牛排。

src: This woman's business has succeeded.
mt: 这个女人的事业成功了。
ref: 这个女人的生意成功了。

src: The students left the classroom.
The woman claimed that she saw a ghost.
mt: 这位妇女声称她看到了一位鬼魂。
ref: 那个女人声称她看见了鬼。

src: The man lost his hearing.
The child let go of the balloon string.
The man lost the ability to speak.
mt: 这位男子失去了说话的能力。
ref: 那人失去了说话的能力。

src: The woman tripped on the sidewalk.
mt: 这位女士在行人道上摔了一跤。
ref: 那女人在人行道上绊倒了。

src: The man jumped into the pool in a cannon style.
mt: 这人跳进游泳池，像炮弹一样。
ref: 那人加农炮式跳入了池子。

src: I took antibiotics.
The traffic light turned yellow.
The plastic container melted.
The car is sunken.
The boy studied all night.
The little boy clung to the edge of the pool.
mt: 小男孩紧紧抓住游泳池的边缘。
ref: 小男孩紧紧抓住池子边缘。

src: I put my hand on my chest.
The building next to my office is under construction.
ref: 我办公室旁边的大楼正在建设中。

src: The family wants to get to know their new neighbor.
mt: 这家人想认识他们新搬来的邻居。
ref: 这个家庭想了解他们的新邻居。

src: Water splashed from the pool.
I bit a slice of watermelon.
The boy was tripped.
The woman inserted earplugs.
I refilled the water bottle.
This TV show is under censorship.
ref: 这个电视节目受到审查。

src: The ship wrecked.
The boy was stumped by the riddle.
mt: 这孩子被这个谜题难住了。
ref: 男孩被这个谜语难住了。

src: The phone rang.
The woman stared at me.
The group left the museum.
The man quarreled with me.
The tires on my bicycle are flat.
mt: 我的自行车的轮胎是空的。
ref: 我自行车上的轮胎没气了。

src: The girl was pale.
The pen has run out of ink.
The man was refused a loan.
mt: 这位男子被拒绝了贷款。

src: The girl stays at home after school.
mt: 女孩在放学后待在家里。
ref: 那个女孩放学后呆在家里。

src: The garbage bag is full.
I vacuumed the carpet.
The man lost his temper.
The girl threw a branch into the campfire.
mt: 这个女孩把一根树枝扔进了篝火。
ref: 那女孩把一根树枝扔进篝火里。

src: The man came out of the shower.
Parents want their children to go to college.
mt: 家长希望孩子们上大学。
ref: 父母希望他们的孩子上大学。

src: The man untied his shoes.
mt: 这个人解开了他的鞋带。

src: The man ate half of the main dish.
My ankle is swollen.
My office door is open.
mt: 我的办公室门是开着的。
ref: 我的办公室门是开着的。

src: I have to wait in line.
The man hit the fly hard.
The man wrote a will.
The runner felt his rival approaching.
mt: 跑者感觉对手正在靠近。
ref: 赛跑者感觉到他的竞争对手在逼近。

src: I considered this question carefully.
mt: 我认真考虑了这个问题。
ref: 我仔细考虑了这个问题。

src: The traveler walked on the crumbling suspension bridge.
mt: 旅客走在摇摇欲坠的吊桥上。
ref: 旅行者走在摇摇欲坠的吊桥上。

src: The man expected the team to win.
ref: 那人预料到球队会获胜。

src: The boy can't sleep.
